posts.title: 昆山市总工会开展学习十九大报告专题交流活动 - 总工会 -乐居昆山
posts.text:
11月3日上午，昆山市总工会开展学习十九大报告专题交流活动，昆山市人大常委会副主任、市总工会主席赵坤元，市第五派驻纪检组组长黄晓辉出席了交流活动，市总工会全体干部职工集体畅谈学习。
 大家发言中一致认为，习总书记做的报告内容丰富、主题明确、立意深远、气势磅礴、令人振奋，是全面建成小康社会、夺取新时代中国特色社会主义伟大胜利，实现中华民族伟大复兴的纲领文件。
 赵坤元要求，以习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想为指导，把学习贯彻十九大精神与工会工作紧密结合起来，抢抓机遇，乘势而上，2018年做好三件事：一是以推进工会改革为契机，增强工会生机活力。按照增强“三性”、去除“四化”、做强基层、着力创新的总体思路，在建机制、强功能、增实效上下功夫，创新工会工作体制机制和方式方法，推动改革向基层延伸、向纵深拓展；二是以转变工作作风为抓手，密切联系职工群众。在全市范围内推行实施《非公有制企业工会主席绩效考核奖励制度》，进一步提升非公企业工会主席履职积极性，激发非公企业工会活力；三是以新发展理念为引领，组织职工建功立业。为了让更多的会员受益，实行工会会员学历提升计划，提升广大职工学历层次，拓宽就业、升职渠道，促进职工素质全面发展。

posts.author: patient.info
posts.title: Catheterization
posts.text: I had Rezum procedure 7 weeks ago. Doc said he was "aggressive" with the steam, as I had a serious urinary retention problem ((600 ml+). Had Foley cataeter in for 4 days after and couldn't urinate when taken out. Have been doing self-catheterization for nearly 7 weeks now and still can't pee without. Last saw Doc at 3 weeks and he said this was "normal, given how aggressive I was with the steam." Next checkup isn't until mid-December. Is need for catheterization "normal" this long after the procedure?

thread.section_title: Healthcare Plus

posts.author: healthcareplusweb
posts.text:
Most people do not know it, but almost half of the beneficial nutrients in lemons are contained in the shell. Because of its bitter taste, most people strip the skin and use only the juice of that fruit. But when you lose the shell, you waste a lot of nutrients that can improve your overall health and even fight joint pain.
The lemon peel contains important nutrients such as lemon oil, lemongrass and phellandrene, as well as vitamin C, citric acid, malic acid, formic acid, hesperidin and pectins and more.
Lemon peel has some potent qualities and is a strong antiseptic that can help fight fever. In fact, it has been shown that the essential oils contained in the lemon peel reduce joint pain by relaxing the blood vessels and producing an anti-inflammatory effect that significantly reduces the pain sensations.

posts.author: TASR
posts.title: Arcidiecézna charita upozorňuje na problém financovania opatrovateliek
posts.text: Arcidiecézna charita upozorňuje na problém financovania opatrovateliek Ilustračné foto. Foto: TASR - Henrich Mišovič Poskytovatelia sociálnych služieb na Slovensku veľmi ťažko zháňajú opatrovateľky doma na Slovensku, pričom 40.000 až 50.000 opatrovateliek zo Slovenska opatruje seniorov v zahraničí na západ od nás. Autor TASR Editor Dominika Zúborová dnes 10:14 Košice 7. novembra (TASR) - Opatrovateľská služba na Slovensku čaká na systémové opatrenia, národný projekt totiž o pol roka končí. Tvrdí to člen predsedníctva Asociácie poskytovateľov sociálnych služieb v SR a riaditeľ Arcidiecéznej charity Košice Cyril Korpesio. Podľa jeho slov 40.000 až 50.000 opatrovateliek zo Slovenska opatruje seniorov v zahraničí na západ od nás. Ako tvrdí, poskytovatelia sociálnych služieb na Slovensku len veľmi ťažko zháňajú opatrovateľky doma na Slovensku. " Pre zle nastavené financovanie v sociálnych službách opatrovateľskú prácu na oddeleniach vykonáva oveľa menší počet opatrovateliek, ako stanovujúštandardy kvality. Kvalifikované odhady hovoria, že je to až o tretinu menej, ako stanovujúštandardy. Ak 70 percent všetkých nákladov v zariadeniach sociálnych služieb tvoria mzdy a odvody, tak ušetriť sa dá iba ich znížením. Je to začarovaný kruh, ktorý mala riešiť novela zákona o sociálnych službách," tvrdí Korpesio. "Minulý rok pri odmietnutí takzvanej 'malej novely' zákona, ktorá mala riešiť hlavne financovanie sociálnych služieb a pripravili ju neverejní poskytovatelia sociálnych služieb, minister práce, sociálnych vecí a rodiny sľúbil, že do sociálnych služieb pri novej novele pôjde medziročne viac o 100 miliónov eur. Na pracovnej skupine k novele zákona v prvej polovici tohto roka štátny tajomník Ministerstva práce, sociálnych vecí a rodiny (MPSVR) SR už rozprával o sume okolo 70 miliónov eur. Schválená novela zákona hovorí o dosahu na štátny rozpočet zhruba vo výške 44 miliónov eur. Bez dostatočného balíka financií sa v sociálnych službách nedajú nastaviť a rozbehnúť systémové opatrenia," tvrdí Korpesio. Ako ďalej uviedol, aktuálne v druhom čítaní prerokovaná novela zákona o sociálnych službách v NR SR vôbec nerieši opatrovateľskú službu a služby krízovej intervencie. "Opatrovateľskú službu, podľa registrov opatrovateľských služieb, poskytuje na Slovensku len niečo viac ako jedna tretina obcí. Pritom ju majú vo svojej priamej pôsobnosti. Ministerstvo podporilo opatrovateľskú službu cez národný projekt opatrovateľskej služby, prostredníctvom ktorého je zamestnaných asi 3500 opatrovateliek spravidla za minimálnu mzdu. Celkove podľa údajov ministerstva išlo na tento národný projekt 50 miliónov eur," vysvetlil riaditeľ Arcidiecéznej charity Košice. Ako povedal, už pri prijímaní tejto novely upozorňovali ministerstvo, že národný projekt sa končí v apríli 2018. "Je to v poradí druhý národný projekt na podporu opatrovateľskej služby. Medzi skončením prvého a začiatkom druhého uplynul viac ako jeden rok. Máme dodnes na pamäti smutné osudy ľudí, ktorí ostali z jedného dňa na druhý bez akejkoľvek pomoci po skončení prvého národného projektu. Opatrovateľky skončili zväčša na úradoch práce. Pre opatrovaných, ale aj ich rodinných príslušníkov to boli ťažké a bolestivé rozhodnutia," dodal Korpesio. Podľa medializovaných informácií mal vtedy okrem iného uviesť, že obvinenému na jeho žiadosť sprostredkoval kontakt na Mikuláša Č. dnes 11:05 J. Mazák sa opätovne uchádza o kandidatúru na sudcu Všeobecného súdu EÚ. 13:10 Pre podozrenie z prípravy útoku vo Francúzsku zadržali 10 podozrivých. Dnešná policajná operácia sa na území Francúzska odohráva v departmáne Val-de-Marne, ktorý sa rozprestiera juhovýchodne od Paríža, a v regióne Alpes-Maritimes, kam patrí aj Francúzska Riviéra a Alpy. 12:57 Štart Trnavského Rádia je naplánovaný na 17. novembra. Populárny spevák bol spojený s divadlom Semafor a preslávil sa duetom Mám malý stan, ktorý naspieval s Waldemarom Matuškom. 11:45 Dlhoročné hrozby bosnianskych Srbov, že podniknú kroky smerom k odtrhnutiu od zvyšku Bosny a Hercegoviny, sa nateraz nenaplnia. Parlament bosnianskej Republiky srbskej rozhodol v utorok o pozastavení plánu vypísať súvisiace referendum. 11:36 M. Klose prinesie trofej na žreb MS 2018 v moskovskom Kremli. Bývalý útočník nemeckej reprezentácie prinesie na pódium trofej, ktorú s ňou získal po finálovom triumfe na MS 2014 nad Argentínou. 11:34 NASES: O e-služby štátu je štyrikrát väčší záujem ako pred rokom. 11:31 Z OP Ľudské zdroje sa   miliónov eur. 11:20 Križovatku Blatné sprejazdní NDS o mesiac skôr, než plánovala. thread.section_title: Business News | TMXmoney | Business News
thread.title: Sony pulls festival premiere of 'All the Money,' with Spacey
thread.title_full: Business News | TMXmoney | Sony pulls festival premiere of 'All the Money,' with Spacey

posts.author: Jake Coyle, The Associated Press,
posts.title: Sony pulls festival premiere of 'All the Money,' with Spacey
posts.text:
NEW YORK - Sony Pictures has pulled the film "All the Money in the World" from its AFI Fest premiere following the sexual misconduct allegations made against co-star Kevin Spacey.
In a statement Monday, Sony's TriStar Pictures said it was withdrawing the film from the Los Angeles festival because "it would be inappropriate to celebrate a gala at this difficult time." It had been slated to be the festival's closing night film on November 16.
Directed by Ridley Scott, "All the Money in the World" is one of the fall movie season's more anticipated releases, with many expecting it to be a potential Oscar contender. In it, Spacey plays oil tycoon J. Paul Getty. When his 16-year-old grandson is kidnapped, Getty refuses to pay the ransom. The boy's mother (Michelle Williams) and Getty's adviser (Mark Wahlberg) work to recapture him.
TriStar said the film's December 22 release date remains unchanged, a decision that for now preserves the awards-season position of "All the Money in the World."
"A film is not the work of one person. There are over 800 other actors, writers, artists, craftspeople and crew who worked tirelessly and ethically on this film, some for years, including one of cinema's master directors," said TriStar. "It would be a gross injustice to punish all of them for the wrongdoings of one supporting actor in the film."
The AFI Fest said it supported Sony's decision to postpone the film's premiere "in order to ensure the thousands of people who worked together on this film are honoured at a proper time and in a proper light." The festival made no announcement of a replacement film.
Netflix on Friday cut ties with Spacey, the star of its hit drama series "House of Cards." Production on its sixth season has been suspended indefinitely. The company also scuttled its Gore Vidal biopic, with Spacey starring as the author, even though it had just finished shooting.
"Star Trek" actor Anthony Rapp last week claimed that Spacey made sexual advances against him in 1986, when he was 14. In the days since, numerous others have also come forward to make various allegations of sexual harassment and assault against Spacey. London police are reportedly investigating Spacey for a 2008 sexual assault.
Spacey has not responded to the mounting allegations but apologized to Rapp for what he called "deeply inappropriate drunken behaviour."

thread.title: Debatte um Seehofer: Müller: Generationswechsel in CSU nur im "Miteinander"
thread.title_full: Debatte um Seehofer: Müller: Generationswechsel in CSU nur im "Miteinander"

posts.title: Debatte um Seehofer: Müller: Generationswechsel in CSU nur im "Miteinander"
posts.text: FDP-Vorsitzender FDP-Chef Lindner: "Wir haben keine Angst vor Neuwahlen" Facebook Berlin/München Seit dem CSU-Wahlfiasko steht Parteichef Seehofer intern massiv in der Kritik. In der Partei werden Rufe nach seinem Rückzug laut. Inhalt   Müller: Generationswechsel in CSU nur im "Miteinander" Der CSU-Politiker Stefan Müller hat seine Partei angesichts der Debatte über die Zukunft von Parteichef Horst Seehofer zu Einigkeit aufgerufen. "Natürlich wird es irgendwann einen Generationswechsel geben, das kann aber nur im Miteinander auch innerhalb der CSU erfolgen", sagte der parlamentarische Geschäftsführer der CSU-Landesgruppe im Deutschen Bundestag der Deutschen Presse-Agentur in Berlin. "Wir haben uns darauf verständigt, dass wir über Personalfragen reden, wenn die Sondierungsverhandlungen hier abgeschlossen sind. An dem Zeitplan sollten wir festhalten. Wir haben eine schwierige Woche vor uns." Der bayerische Ministerpräsident und CSU-Chef Seehofer steht seit dem CSU-Fiasko bei der Bundestagswahl intern massiv in der Kritik. Am Wochenende forderte die bayerische Junge Union (JU) als erste große Parteiorganisation offen den Rückzug des 68-Jährigen spätestens im kommenden Jahr. Zuvor hatten schon mehrere CSU-Bezirksvorstände in internen Sitzungen einen "geordneten" personellen Übergang gefordert. Seehofer will sich nach Abschluss der Sondierungen von Union, FDP und Grünen über eine mögliche Jamaika-Koalition sehr schnell zu seiner politischen Zukunft und der künftigen personellen Aufstellung der CSU äußern. Müller sagte auf eine entsprechende Frage, er sehe Seehofer wegen der Personaldebatte nicht als belastet bei den Jamaika-Sondierungen an. "Gleichwohl ist es wichtig, dass wir alle den Kopf frei haben für die Themen, die nun in dieser Woche anstehen. Über Personalfragen haben wir anschließend immer noch Zeit zu reden", sagte der CSU-Politiker. "Dass dann aber im Hinblick auf den Parteitag und auch auf die Frage der Spitzenkandidatur im nächsten Jahr und auch wie die neue Staatsregierung dann aufgestellt werden soll, geredet werden soll, ist unstrittig."

posts.title: У Києві маршрутка врізалась у позашляховик та перекинулась, є поранені
posts.text: У Києві маршрутка врізалась у позашляховик та перекинулась, є поранені У Києві маршрутка врізалась у позашляховик та перекинулась, є поранені 11:33 07.11.2017 Подія сталася на столичній Оболоні. Потерпілим надають медичну допомогу. За попередніми даними, водій мікроавтобуса порушив правила дорожнього руху, у результаті чого відбулося зіткнення із позашляховиком. Близько 7-ї ранку поліція отримала повідомлення, що по вулиці Богатирській сталася аварія, внаслідок якої перекинулася маршрутка. На місце події відразу прибули екіпажі патрульних та слідчо-оперативна група територіального управління поліції, а також слідчі Головного управління поліції Києва. Правоохоронці задокументували подію та опитали очевидців. Попередньо встановлено, що водій маршрутки, рухаючись у напрямку Героїв Дніпра, порушив правила дорожнього руху, скоїв поворот у невстановленому місці, внаслідок чого автомобіль "Вольво ХС 90" вдарив мікроавтобус у праву сторону. У результаті маршрутка перекинулася на лівий бік. П’ятеро пасажирів маршрутного таксі отримали тілесні ушкодження (попередньо - нетяжкі), їх госпіталізували. 36-річний водій іномарки та 48-річний водій маршрутки не постраждали. Подія належним чином зареєстрована в Журналі єдиного обліку заяв та повідомлень Оболонського управління поліції. Вирішується питання щодо відкриття кримінального провадження, у рамках якого будуть встановлені обставини та механізм автопригоди. За матеріалами ВК ГУНП у Києві Увага! Ми маємо оперативне відео з місця ДТП , тому слідкуйте за нашими подальшими повідомленнями.

posts.author: www.4-traders.com
posts.title: Global B2B Marketplace, iiSnap Helping Manufacturers Sell Internationally with First to Market Buying Model
posts.text:
iiSnap, the Western Australia based start-up company is disrupting the traditional distribution model, enabling manufacturing companies to sell directly to retailers and gain significant savings by removing barriers to entry. iiSnap has introduced a first to market buying model that forecast demand and group retailers orders to meet suppliers MOQ (minimum order quantity) goal. 
“As Retail becomes more and more challenging for businesses; we want to give retailers the opportunity to have a new edge over the big competitors by providing them access to higher margins and exciting products" stated Ami Barda, founder of iiSnap. 
"We also want to empower smaller businesses because 80% of the buying force in the market of consumer products purchasing is small to medium enterprises." 
iiSnap has partnered with some of the leading companies in the supply chain industry to offer end to end buying and selling solutions that includes secure payment processing, quality control, fulfillments, and shipping. 
Products will be available across a wide range of categories including lifestyle tech, kids & family, Outdoors tech, wearables, fitness and leisure as well as audio and entertainment. 
iiSnap mainly focuses on tech and design-centric brands with unique product offering, companies currently on-boarding the site will be able to sell directly to specialty retailers in their industry with the aim to have a passionate and motivated retailer behind the sale process. 
The company has managed to automate the complicated procurement process to provide SME's buyers with a transparent and seamless buying experience that saves them time and money. 
iiSnap offers low barriers to entry for vendors with no subscription or membership fees but simply straightforward marketplace fees on orders placed on the platform. 
“The aim was always to develop a win-win scenario; No sales? No Fees. Our aim is to bring the margins back to the retailers, the innovative products to the consumers, and the profits back to the manufacturers” says Barda. 
iiSnap is open to new suppliers applications and buyers interested can request an invitation on the company home page 
Links

Video https://vimeo.com/224607434 
FB https://www.facebook.com/iisnapb2b/ 
Twitter https://twitter.com/iisnaps 
Linkedin https://www.linkedin.com/company/6453185/

thread.title: 手机厂商们的爸爸高通，被你多半没听过的公司收购了
thread.title_full: 手机厂商们的爸爸高通，被你多半没听过的公司收购了 -百家号

posts.author: 差评
posts.title: 手机厂商们的爸爸高通，被你多半没听过的公司收购了
posts.text:
摘要：神仙打架群众吃瓜前两天，差评君看到了一则很厉害的新闻↓博通计划大约以1000多亿美元的股票和现金收购高通。高通（Qualcomm)差友们应该比较熟悉，因为许多安卓手机的芯片用的就是高通的。普及率有多大
神仙打架
群众吃瓜
前两天，差评君看到了一则很厉害的新闻↓
博通计划大约以 1000 多亿美元的股票和现金收购高通。
高通（Qualcomm ) 差友们应该比较熟悉，因为许多安卓手机的芯片用的就是高通的。
普及率有多大呢？
高通的存在感这么高，另一个原因可能是因为这个人↓
雷军：不服跑个分?
其实，高通不止是处理器这么简单，网络芯片，通信技术还有快充技术等等都有涉猎，而且是著名的专利大户，靠着专利收了不少钱。
但博通在吃瓜群众面前曝光程度就没那么高了，也难怪这个新闻一出的时候震动这么大，差评君身边不少朋友都表示很惊讶： 高通要被收购了？？？
博通好厉害竟然能收购高通。。。咦，等等，博通是谁啊？？？
所以，今天咱就来聊聊博通（Broadcom）。
说到博通，其实得把 2015 年前后分开讲，因为 2015 年后的博通其实并不是博通了，还保留着 “ 博通 ” 的名字而已。
博通在 2015 年以前，主要业务是网络通信半导体，也就是网卡，曾经还是最大的 WLAN 芯片供应商，有2000多项美国专利和800多项外国专利。
博通在被收购前，是全球几大主要无厂半导体公司之一。
什么是无厂半导体公司呢？
就是主要负责芯片和电路设计，然后交给别的晶圆厂代工的半导体公司，大家熟知的计划被收购对象高通也是无厂半导体公司。
这种半导体产业结构在如今非常普遍，一方面可以让高通，博通等公司专注研发并且省下建厂的成本；另一方面让代工厂可以同时服务于好几家公司，提高生产线的利用率。
2016 年度代工企业的营收，这些名字更陌生了，但他们和你的电子产品关系很大
博通被收购以前，高通可以说稳坐龙头，2013 年营收几乎是博通的两倍。
但是 2015 年出了个大事儿，它被另一家半导体公司安华高科技 （Avago）收购了，花了 370 亿美元。
当时大家的反应其实和这几天差不多，只不过高通还没做出回应
这一收购，高通的地位就不太稳了。。。
直到今年，在第二季度博通的营收超越了高通，成为了第一。
高通本身一直靠着专利收钱，比如只要手机厂商用了高通的东西，哪怕在这基础上有自己的研发，手机卖了 100 块也得分个 5 块钱给高通。
这笔 “ 高通税 ” 让各大厂商恨得牙痒，于是苹果和高通就打起架来了。。。
再加上其他厂商的芯片开始起势，5G 迟迟没有落地，高通今年股价掉了不少。
这时候博通的 CEO，有着华裔血统的并购高手 Hock Tan 出手了，以 70 美元每股的价格用现金和股票溢价收购高通，初始收购资本合计约 1000 亿美元左右，消息一出，两家公司股价大涨，现在这笔收购计划涉及金额可能是 1300 亿美元。
一看就像个大佬
这场收购对于我们有什么影响呢？
其实直接影响没有什么，因为这些厂商的消费者不是我们，而是做手机，电脑的厂商们。
但是如果两者并购，那么就会造成无线通讯芯片垄断，而且两者在这个市场上的营收可能是其他小厂加起来也比不上的，如果他们耍起流氓来，估计没人治得了了。
一旦出现这种现象，那么冲击到了手机，笔记本厂商，可能最后还是得涨个价，我们消费者摊点儿钱。。。
其实 1300 亿美元看起来很多，但对高通来说也不算什么事，人家随便打打官司捞几笔专利侵权费就回来了！
毕竟高通其实是全球最强律师事务所（滑稽

posts.title: Toàn quốc - Điểm nổi bật của đại lý bán buôn mũ bảo hiểm CSC
posts.text:
Kinh doanh mũ bảo hiểm là mặt hàng đang vô cùng HOT hiện nay bởi mũ bảo hiểm có xu hướng đổi mới liên tục trong thời gian gần đây. Bạn đang có ý định kinh doanh nhưng chưa chọn được đại lý bán buôn nón bảo hiểm thì đừng lo. Công ty CSC là địa chỉ các bạn đang tìm kiếm.
>> Như thế nào là một chiếc mũ bảo hiểm có kính chống lóa chất lượng
Những đặc điểm nổi bật của đại lý bán buôn mũ bảo hiểm Công ty CSC
Công ty sản xuất nón bảo hiểm Công ty CSC tự thiết kế, sản xuất mũ bảo hiểm và chỉ bán buôn cho các đại lý, những người kinh doanh nhỏ lẻ khác nên giá thành của mũ bảo hiểm được coi là rẻ nhất, tối ưu nhất khi các bạn lựa chọn. Mũ bảo hiểm của Công ty CSC luôn tối ưu về giá thành, những người kinh doanh nón bảo hiểm không phải qua bất kì một kênh trung gian nào khác. CSC cũng hộ trợ những khách mua buôn nón bảo hiểm với việc không át số lượng nón bảo hiểm cần lấy. Bạn hoàn toàn yên tâm.
Như những hãng sản xuất mũ bảo hiểm nổi tiếng khác, nón bảo hiểm của CSC có chất lượng đạt chuẩn theo tiêu chuẩn của tổng cục an toàn chất lượng. Để giúp các bạn khách buôn hiểu nhiều hơn về chiếc nón bảo hiểm này, sau đây là những dấu hiệu nhận biết mũ bảo hiểm chất lượng CSC:
Thứ nhất, về cấu tạo mũ phải đủ 3 bộ phận gồm vỏ mũ, lớp đệm hấp thụ xung động bên trong vỏ nón (đệm bảo vệ) và quai đeo.
Thứ hai, nón đó đã được chứng nhận hợp quy, được gắn dấu hợp quy CR (dấu hợp quy CR phải được thể hiện một cách rõ ràng, dễ đọc, được in trực tiếp lên mũ bảo hiểm hoặc được dán lên nón bảo hiểm bằng chất liệu không thấm nước, không thể tẩy xóa, làm mờ dấu hợp quy) và có ghi nhãn hàng hóa theo quy định của pháp luật.
Hãy đến Công ty CSC để nhập mũ bảo hiểm nhé..
>> Những nguyên liệu vô cùng quan trọng trong san xuat mu bao hiem

posts.text:
EUREX/Bund-Future startet wenig verändert 
FRANKFURT (Dow Jones)--Der Dezember-Kontrakt des Bund-Futures zeigt sich im frühen Handel am Dienstag mit 163,13 Prozent kaum verändert. Das Tageshoch liegt bislang bei 163,16 Prozent und das Tagestief bei 163,06 Prozent. Umgesetzt wurden bis 8.50 Uhr 18.200 Kontrakte. Der BOBL-Futures gewinnt 1 Tick auf 131,92 Prozent. Angesichts des leeren Terminkalendars zeichnet sich ein ruhiges Geschäft ab. 
Die Commerzbank setzt weiter auf Long-Positionen. Die EZB habe zu Wochenbeginn bekannt gegeben, dass sich die Reinvestitionen zwischen November 2017 und Oktober 2018 auf 129,8 Mrd Euro belaufen werden, wovon 101 Mrd Euro auf das Anleihekaufprogramm (PSPP) entfallen sollen. Die Commerzbank rechnet im kommenden Jahr mit Reinvestitionen von insgesamt 145 Milliarden Euro. 
DJG/mpt/gos

posts.text: A Lowell man was found guilty Monday of murder in the 2013 bludgeoning deaths of his parents, whose decomposing bodies police found in their home nearly a month later. After an eleven day trial, a Lake Superior Court jury deliberated for about 2 1/2 hours before finding Thomas Snow guilty on all counts in what prosecuting attorney Mark Watson called a "very deliberate killing" that took "a lot of time" with "multiple blows." posts.text:
Mua quyền ưu tiên cho tin 
Mỡ bò Castrol Spheerol EPL 0 1 2 3 Castrol Spheerol EPL 0, 1, 2, 3 là dòng sản phẩm mỡ bò bôi trơn castrol chất lượng cao có trị số làm đặc NLGI 2, được pha chế theo công nghệ đặc biệt của hãng dầu nhớt Castrol một trong những nhà sản xuất mỡ công ghiệp hàng đầu thế giới. Với thành phần là dầu gốc khoáng cao cấp kết hợp hệ phụ gia có tính biến nhiệt và khả năng chịu tải cao cho sản phẩm. Castrol Spheerol EPL 0, 1,2, 3 là mỡ đa dụng cao cấp gốc lithium với đặc tính chịu được cực áp, được sử dụng rộng rãi trong công nghiệp với phạm vi nhiệt độ từ -20°C đến 120°C Loại mỡ này đặc biệt thích hợp để bôi trơn cho các ổ bi và ổ trượt tải trọng nặng và chịu tải trọng va đập. Chúng có chứa các phụ gia ức chế chống ăn mòn và chống ôxy hóa, khả năng kháng nước và chống rỉ sét rất tốt. Mỡ bôi trơn Castrol Spheerol EPL 0 Mỡ bôi trơn Castrol Spheerol EPL 1 Mỡ bôi trơn Castrol Spheerol EPL 2 Mỡ bôi trơn Castrol Spheerol EPL 3 Castrol Spheerol EPL 0, 1, 2, 3 được sử dụng bôi trơn cho các ổ bi và ổ trượt trong các nhà máy xi-măng, giấy, thép; các ổ đỡ và thiết bị trong ngành hàng hải, thi công cơ giới và khai thác mỏ. posts.author: glbtech
posts.text: Hidegen szívatóval nekem sem volt soha stabil alapjárata, illetve van, csak vagy leáll, vagy nagyon forog. Én nem szoktam melegíteni egy percet sem, beindítom és megyek, így még nulla fokban is vissza tudom tolni a szívatót 1 km-en belül. Persze óvatosabban megyek vele ilyenkor, nem bántom ha hideg. Mínuszokban szokott olyan lenni, hogy már menet közben is érezhetően szegény neki a keverék, mintha kívánna egy kis dúsítást. De mínuszban azért egyre ritkábban motorozok, mert ráfagy a plexire a pára. :-) Nulla fokig megyek, addig meg jó minden.

posts.text: Ah oui dur ! j'avoue que pour ça je suis sauvée, bébé fait ses nuits, il est très indépendants, sait s'occuper seul et est plutot calme.. par contre pour la grossesse je te rejoins j'espere que la deuxième sera plus calme. Mon fils etait en RCIU ... donc suivi poussé.. et meme une amniocentèse à 8 mois de grossesse, il etait tellement hors des courbes que le gyné s'inquietait... finalement tout allait bien et né à 2kg750 et 48cm... donc dans la normal meme si un peu basse... on m'a fait tellement peur.. alors que dimanche suis devenue tatie, d'une petite fille née à 38 sa donc un peu en avance mais pas préma non plus. et elle ne fait que 44cm et 2kg500 à terme elle aurait fait le poids de mon fils et surement 46 cm max... et on a jamais fais stressé sa maman

posts.text: boyd9308, I had a turp done around 15 months ago. I was like you, had to wear a catheter after the surgery and could not urinate on my own. posts.text:
En réponse à malauub Salut Juununo, je te suis de près, mon fils à 10 mois et demi, et je suis enceinte de 5SA C'était désiré aussi d'avoir très peu d'écart entre les 2. On avait dit qu'on attendrait ses 12 mois en Decembre pour commencer. Mais avec mon mari on était impatient et bébé s'est installé en C1
Le mot d'ordre il me semble est organisation On en a deja bcp parlé.
Puis la situation aussi, on a attendu d'avoir tout. 2 boulots temps pleins, notre maison, une crèche pas loin... Et puis c'est que pour du bonheur meme si c'est certain se sera pas de tout repos
Salut malauub, a oui en effet on es au meme stad ^^, j’ai qu’une hâte que bébé 2 soit deja la on es dejà comblé de bonheur mais avec 2 on le sera encore bien plus j’ai dèjà qu’une hâte c’est de savoir qu’elle sera sont sexe ☺️ Apres moi j’ai fait le choix d’arreté de travaillé j’avais un cdi d’accord mais que mes heures diminuer .. plus beaucoup de salaire ma nounou avez demisionné. J’avais plus de nourice je pense qu’une acumulation de tout fait que j’ai arreté, j’avais des heures tres decalé .. donc je profite un peu de mon bébé de ma grossesse et après je retravaillerai ☺️ Mon mari a un bon salaire donc on es tres bien comme ca pour l’instant 😁

EUREX/DAX-Future steigt auf Allzeithoch 
FRANKFURT (Dow Jones)--Der Dezember-Kontrakt des DAX-Futures steigt im frühen Handel am Dienstag um 43 auf 13.512 Punkte. Das Tageshoch liegt bislang bei 13.516,5, was einem neuen Allzeithoch entspricht, das Tagestief bei 13.506 Punkten. Umgesetzt wurden bis 8.43 Uhr rund 3.500 Kontrakte. Charttechnisch wichtig wäre ein nachhaltiger Ausbruch über das bisherige Hoch. Nach unten gilt es die Unterstützung bei 13.250 Punkten zu verteidigen.

posts.author: 梦繁林
posts.title: 梦繁林：黄金投资之散户存在的问题外汇论坛,人民币贬值,炒外汇,纸白银,外汇开户,外汇返佣
posts.text:
梦繁林：黄金投资之散户存在的问题
很多投资者无论是在入市前还是入市投资一段时间的新手，你们在一门心思想着如何去获利的情况下，是否给自己分析定位过?如果没有，我想接下来你该做的是认真去想想这个问题，找到适合自己的方向，踏踏实实的去做或许能起到事半功倍的效果!
以下笔者总结散户所存在的问题点：
1、没老师指导，自己到处看群做单，看小周期做，来回追，来回损。
2、自己主见很强，从来不单独信哪一个人的，看各个老师的分析，自己综合着做单。看对了的，自己因为没有信心，都没进场，看错了的，都做进去，亏了而且心里极度不爽，感觉天昏地暗。
3、有老师指导，总是重仓做单而且总是看反。
4、看对的时候，赚一点小钱就出了，看错的时候，就套单或者锁单，最后总是砍在最低点或者天地连环锁全砍。
5、震荡行情做的还行，但是有一天重仓来回追来回砍了之后，对行情有了恐惧感，觉得每天都是单边，不敢做单，但实际上每天都是震荡；突然有一天觉得是震荡的时候，结果是单边。
6、单边行情，看对了，但是总是不到进场点，错过了，好不容易做上一单，结果先震荡一波，导致赚一点点就跑了，懊恼不已之时，回调就被套了。一被套就盘整，总觉得至少能回调保本或者小亏出场，虽然知道趋势已经很明显反了但是还是被温水煮青蛙越套越深，最后砍在最高点或者最低点。
做行情，首看趋势，其次看点位，最后是时间。我们强调的是对行情的理解和观察。无论操作的是对还是错，都必须要有操作的理由。有理由的操作，无论对错及时检讨，这才是真正投资，否则，都只会沦为du博。
在投资过程中总会有一些外界因素我们必须克服，要耐得住寂寞，经得起诱惑，看得清陷阱，抓得住机会。最终的胜利必将属于我们！以趋势做单，不求单单盈利，只求稳健盈利、稳健给单，制定好做单方案，掌握好趋势抓住每波大行情，获得一个长期稳健的盈利！
文/梦繁林（威-信：291728240验证：梦繁林）（扣-扣：3403264450）(投资体验群：218692370验证：梦繁林）针对实际市场参与者，考虑到部分市场窗口对于实盘交易具有一定的时效性可与笔者沟通交流，从而能够选择合适的策略进行操作。对大宗商品有深入的研究，如果你做单不顺或投资经常资金缩水，那么你可以百度搜索梦繁林关注笔者本人。

thread.section_title: Berita Daily
thread.title: MACC withdraws summons against Peter Anthony
thread.title_full: MACC withdraws summons against Peter Anthony

posts.author: Berita Daily Staff
posts.title: MACC withdraws summons against Peter Anthony
posts.text:
Twitter 
Lawyer Martin Tommy says he has been informed that the summons for Parti Warisan Sabah vice-president Anthony to appear in Putrajaya to give a statement was cancelled until further notice 
KOTA KINABALU: The Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission (MACC) has withdrawn a summons for Peter Anthony to report to its headquarters in Putrajaya, his lawyer says. 
Lawyer Martin Tommy said he had been informed that the summons for Parti Warisan Sabah vice-president Anthony to appear in Putrajaya to give a statement was cancelled until further notice. 
Anthony had gone to the Sabah MACC headquarters here at 10am Tuesday and was issued a warrant to for him to be present at the commission’s headquarters in Putrajaya at 8am on Wednesday (Nov 8). 
“I do not know why it was withdrawn, they called me to inform me that the warrant to appear in Putrajaya had been cancelled until further notice,” said Tommy. 
“I am surprised that they were insistent that Anthony be present at the MACC headquarters (on Wednesday),” he added. 
Tommy said the call came about 90 minutes after they left the Sabah MACC office. 
Earlier, Anthony said he was only told to come and assist in investigations. 
“I do not know what the case is it about,” he told reporters at the state MACC office. 
It is understood that the investigation centres on a 2015 case involving certain contracts carried out at Universiti Malaysia Sabah (UMS). 
Last month, Anthony was among 13 people including Warisan president Mohd Shafie Apdal who were arrested in connection with a high profile probe on alleged skimming of federal rural projects for Sabah worth RM1.5bil through a network of companies.

posts.author: PublicInvest
posts.title: IJM Corp Berhad - Secures Another Building Job - PublicInvest Research
posts.text:
IJM Corporation via its wholly-owned subsidiary, IJM Construction Sdn Bhd secured a building job with contract value estimated at RM392m yesterday. The contract, with PBT margin estimated at 8% is expected to generate c.RM24m net profit during the construction period of 37.5 months. This job is the Group second building job ytd, with RM451m from one project clinched earlier this year i.e. the UOB building project. Total outstanding orderbook is now estimated at c.RM9.1bn. Earnings are kept unchanged as this is within our job replenishment assumption. Maintain our Neutral recommendation and SOTP-derived TP of RM3.40 .
The scope of works. The new job is to undertake the design, construction and completion of an office building of HSBC at Jalan Tun Razak, Kuala Lumpur. However, we understand that it is not inclusive of the lifts and facade works which will be procured directly by HSBC. The project is expected to take 37.5 months, with completion by December 2020. Going forward, new jobs eyed by the Group among others include the new Phase of Kuantan Port, ECRL and Gemas-JB double track. Source: PublicInvest Research - 7 Nov 2017

thread.section_title: Berita Daily
thread.title: Flood victims increase in Penang
thread.title_full: Flood victims increase in Penang

posts.author: Bernama
posts.title: Flood victims increase in Penang
posts.text:
Twitter 
A police flood operations room spokesman says up till noon today, all of the victims were placed at 50 relief centres in four districts in the state 
GEORGE TOWN: The number of flood victims evacuated to relief centres in Penang has increased to 7,294 people from 1,774 families as of noon from 6,080 people from 1,572 families this morning. 
A police flood operations room spokesman said up till noon today, all of the victims were placed at 50 relief centres in four districts in the state. 
“A total of 4,032 flood victims are housed in 22 relief centres in Seberang Perai Utara (SPU) and 3,163 people in 26 relief centres in Seberang Perai Tengah (SPT). 
“In Seberang Perai Selatan (SPS), four people are still staying at a relief centre and 21 people in Timur Laut remain at a relief centre as of noon,” he said here today. 
Several roads in SPU that closed this morning remained close to traffic, including Jalan Lahar Yooi-Sungai Dua, Lahar Yooi-Padang Menora, Jalan Pokok Tampang and Jalan Padang Tonsun. 
The spokesman said water level in several areas affected by floods had began to recede and the residents were returning to their homes to clean their houses. 
The weather in Penang at noon today is sunny. 
So far the floods in Penang, described as the worst in the state’s history, had claimed seven lives.

thread.title: AB
thread.title_full: Temple & Webster reviewed by AB

posts.author: AB
posts.title: Product not delivered at all
posts.text: Product not delivered at all. These people cannot deliver to an address in the Sydney CBD, which Officeworks, Matt Black etc have no trouble finding. I paid for the product three weeks ago. I have since followed up countless times. They continue to blame their 'delivery partner' Australia Post, and are now trying to hide behind T & C's, claiming (falsely) that they were provided with the wrong street address. I have sent them a Google map showing the location, street facade and address. Now that I have sent them a copy of my complaint to the NSW Dept of Fair Trading, they claim to have 'cancelled' my order. Worst customer 'service' I have ever encountered. I could not and would not recommend this lot to anyone at all. Pay a little more, and get what you pay for. Sneaky, snaky and utterly unreliable.

posts.text:
2017_1년, 씨앗의 발견 [열린 작업장] 노닥노닥 페스티벌, 그 후 //blog.naver.com/hellosamdi/221134647223
11월 4일, 쌀쌀한 날씨에도 불구하고 디자인과 목공에 관심 있는
많은 노리(청소년)가 노닥노닥페스티벌을 찾아왔는데요.

디자인과 목공 총 여덟 팀으로 나누어 체험이 시작되었습니다.
디자인은 공간 디자인 (맥거핀)/ 쥬얼리 디자인 (페이보릿로그)/ 업사이클링 (두둥)/ 패션디자인 (대성의복점) 팀으로,
목공은 숟가락 깎기x손대패 (고달과 깡통)/ 동물목각인형 (시우) / 연필심조각 (칸트) / 모빌 만들기 (보쳉) 팀으로 구성!
디자인 팀 모습을 담은 짧은 스케치 영상 공간디자인 by. 맥거핀
'삶디 벽면 공간디자인'
맥거핀은 삶디 유리 벽면에 셀로판지를 부착해 공간을 디자인하는 체험을 진행했어요.
공간이라는 제한된 평수 안에 디자인을 담기보다는
우리가 생활하는 모든 공간과 장소에
디자인을 적용할 수 있다는 생각을 청소년에게 전하고 싶었다고 해요.

주머니 만들 수 있어요?
어떻게 재단하면 될까요?
하나둘 배워가며,
작업자 두 분에게 마구마구 질문하기
재봉틀 사용법을 배우고, 도움받아 박음질까지 #세상에하나뿐인에코백만들기 원하는 천을 고른 다음은 재단은 이렇게! 에코백 만들기는 다른 체험에 비해 소요 시간이 길어

끝없이 이어지는 줄... 한 사람을 위한 옷을 디자인하는 #대성의복점 주얼리 디자인 by. 페이보릿로그
'이니셜 주얼리 만들기'
반짝반짝 예쁜 주얼리 속에 내 이니셜과 생일을 뚝딱뚝딱
친구 또는 커플 단위로 찾아와 번호표를 뽑아야 할 정도였어요!
만드는 것에서 끝나지 않고,
주얼리 디자인을 하면서 페이보릿로그가 추구하는 가치를 물으며
진로에 대해 노닥노닥 이야기 나누는 시간들

낚싯줄로 이어 나만의 멋진 모빌을 만들어 나갔어요.
쌓여가는 톱밥.... 그 속에 싹트는 보쳉과의 우정♡ 진정한#노닥노닥 연필심 조각 by.칸트
칸트는 생활목공방 고리로 활동하며
N개의 방과 후 프로젝트 중 쓸모를 만드는 나무로 청소년을 만나고 있어요.
이번 시간에는
고도의 집중력을 필요로 하는 연필심 조각의 작업자로 #짜잔

thread.title: Spiegel: финрегулятор ФРГ подозревает представителей Metro в инсайдерской торговле.
thread.title_full: Spiegel: финрегулятор ФРГ подозревает представителей Metro в инсайдерской торговле. // Advis.ru

posts.author: advis.ru
posts.title: Spiegel: финрегулятор ФРГ подозревает представителей Metro в инсайдерской торговле.
posts.text:
Прокуратура проверяет информацию о возможной причастности к незаконной деятельности со стороны главы набсовета компании Юргена Штайнеманна
Прокуратура немецкого Дюссельдорфа (федеральная земля Северный Рейн - Вестфалия) провела обыски в штаб-квартире немецкого ретейлера Metro AG после того, как Федеральное управление финансового надзора ФРГ (BaFin) заподозрило представителей фирмы в инсайдерской торговле. Об этом сообщил в пятницу еженедельник Der Spiegel.
"Сегодня в первой половине дня полиция и прокуратура провели обыски в помещениях Metro AG", - сказал представитель компании.
По сведениям издания, прокуратура, в частности, проверяет информацию о возможном нарушении закона со стороны главы наблюдательного совета компании Юргена Штайнеманна. В феврале 2016 года он приобрел акции Metro AG за €1 млн. Месяц спустя компания объявила о планах по реструктуризации, благодаря которым стоимость акций существенно выросла. Органы финнадзора полагают, что Штайнеманн мог заранее знать о грядущих переменах, пишет Der Spiegel.
Кроме главы набсовета в инсайдерской торговле подозревают одного из членов правления, говорится в статье.
